title: Mystery Theater Dressing Room Adventure #18
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Star's Dressing Room
rooms.description: An elegant dressing room with a large mirror surrounded by bright bulbs. Costumes hang on a rack, and makeup covers a vanity table. A faded poster on the wall shows a glamorous actress. The air smells of old perfume and stage makeup. A locked door leads backstage.

items.name: makeup vanity table
items.description: A cluttered table with makeup, brushes, and various cosmetics. Three drawers are built into the front.

items.name: opening night program
items.description: A vintage theater program from the show's premiere
items.text: THE MIDNIGHT MASQUERADE - Opening Night, 1952. Starring the incomparable Victoria Blackwood as Lady Sinclair. Performed at the Grand Orpheum Theater. A thrilling mystery in three acts!

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A decorative brass key with theatrical masks engraved on the handle

items.name: costume rack
items.description: A rolling rack filled with elaborate period costumes and gowns

items.name: crumpled note
items.description: A note hidden in a costume pocket
items.text: Reminder for tonight's performance: The final prop is the silver dagger. Don't forget! Victoria must have it for the climactic scene. - Stage Manager

items.name: locked makeup case
items.description: A vintage leather case with a brass lock, containing professional stage makeup

items.name: director's letter
items.description: A personal letter addressed to the lead actress
items.text: Dearest Victoria, your performance as Lady Sinclair has made The Midnight Masquerade the talk of the town. The Grand Orpheum has never seen such talent. Remember, the show must go on! - Director Harold Pemberton

items.name: vintage theater poster
items.description: A framed poster showing a glamorous actress in an elegant gown
items.text: THE MIDNIGHT MASQUERADE starring VICTORIA BLACKWOOD. Now playing at the Grand Orpheum Theater. A mystery that will keep you guessing until the final curtain!

items.name: backstage door
items.description: A heavy wooden door with a star painted on it, leading to the backstage area

rooms.name: Backstage Props Room
rooms.description: A cluttered storage room filled with theatrical props, set pieces, and equipment. Ropes and pulleys hang from the ceiling. Dusty furniture and fake weapons line the walls. A large prop cabinet dominates one corner. The stage exit door is visible to the north, secured with an electronic lock.

items.name: large prop cabinet
items.description: A tall wooden cabinet with glass doors, displaying various stage props and weapons

items.name: silver dagger prop
items.description: A theatrical prop dagger made of silver-painted wood, used in the final scene

items.name: stage manager's logbook
items.description: A worn notebook with production notes and schedules
items.text: Production Log: The Midnight Masquerade has been running for 6 months at the Grand Orpheum. Lead actress Victoria Blackwood is brilliant. The silver dagger prop is crucial for Act III. Security code reminder: Lead actress name, theater name, final prop.

items.name: props table
items.description: A long table covered with various theatrical props and set dressing

items.name: rehearsal notes
items.description: Notes from a recent rehearsal session
items.text: Rehearsal Notes: Victoria nailed the final scene today. The moment when Lady Sinclair reveals the silver dagger always gives me chills. This show at the Grand Orpheum is going to run for years!

items.name: old costume trunk
items.description: A battered trunk filled with old costumes and accessories

items.name: theater history booklet
items.description: A small booklet about the Grand Orpheum Theater
items.text: The Grand Orpheum Theater - A Historic Landmark. Built in 1898, the Grand Orpheum has hosted countless legendary performances. Current production: The Midnight Masquerade, starring Victoria Blackwood.

items.name: stage exit door
items.description: A modern security door with an electronic keypad. A sign reads: 'Emergency Stage Exit - Authorized Personnel Only.' Three security questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead actress?
password_questions.hint: Check the opening night program and theater poster

password_questions.question: What is the name of this theater?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the theater's name

password_questions.question: What is the final prop?
password_questions.hint: The stage manager's notes mention the crucial prop for Act III

rooms.name: Stage Exit to Freedom
rooms.description: You've made it to the stage exit! The door opens onto a quiet alley behind the theater. The night air is cool and refreshing. Street lights illuminate the path to freedom. The mystery of the locked dressing room is behind you now.

items.name: illuminated exit sign
items.description: A glowing red exit sign marking your escape route

items.name: view of the alley
items.description: Through the open door, you can see the peaceful alley and the city beyond

rooms.win_message: Congratulations! You've solved the mysteries of the theater dressing room and made your escape through the stage exit. The secrets of Victoria Blackwood's dressing room and The Midnight Masquerade are yours to keep. The show must go on, but your adventure has reached its final curtain. You win!
